channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Captivate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Captivate

item.title: CVE-2021-21011|2024-09-16T17:32:49.272Z -- adobe -- captivate
item.description: Adobe Captivate 2019 version 11.5.1.499 (and earlier) is affected by an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability that could lead to privilege escalation. An attacker with permissions to write to the file system could leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges.
